tls:text.tls:line: It is our humble opinion that the principle of ruling men
a special privilge instituted to comfort old men from sixty to ninety years of age,

sense.def: exotic food; exotic dishes; outlandish fare

tls:text.tls:line: he ppursued in internal affairs the policy of putting the laws and regulations on a firm basis,
Our present jacks-in-office, having obtained a thievish hold upon the laws of the state,
Justice Zhāng codified the laws and statutes;

sense.def: legal injunction; order by authority of the law

tls:text.tls:line: invited footloose scholars from the four corners of the Empire.

sense.def: mobile scholars, footlose scholars; "Warring States intellectual jet-set"

tls:text.tls:line: The poet here slashes at those who are not in accord with the Kingly Way,
nor could he be considered to have a position ranking with that of ministers of state or court officers.

tls:line.src: TLS notes based on Yuri Krol's study

tls:text.tls:line: The Emperor, whose domain has as its boundaries the Eight Extremities,
